item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1008; 02:19PM; 5707 W Harold Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FFLhEq; #Hollywood; It took 30 firefighters 13 minutes (2:32pm) to access, confine, and extinguish flames in one top-floor unit of a 3-story apartment building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E261 E27 E41 E82 RA41 RA52 T27 T35 T61; CH9; 1; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0950; 01:51PM; 333 S St Andrews Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PHDo64; #Koreatown; It took 18 firefighters 21 minutes (2:12pm) to locate and extinguish a small fire in one bathroom of a 4-story modern apartment building. Two children (7-yo female, 8-yo male) were evaluated for possible smoke inhalation, but not transported. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC11 E229 E29 E52 RA29 T29; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0941; 02:03PM; 704 N Grand Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YBCJHm; #Chinatown; It took 35 firefighters 19 minutes to confine the fire to the first floor unit of a two-unit residential building and extinguish the flames. Only smoke damage affected the upstairs unit. One 57-year-old male was transported in fair condition with smoke-related medical complaints. No other injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E1 E201 E203 E220 E9 EM1 RA17 RA2 RA803 T1 T20 T3; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0941; 01:44PM; 704 N Grand Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YBCJHm; #Chinatown; Two-story apartment building with fire in one unit on the first floor. Offensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E1 E201 E203 E220 E9 RA2 RA803 T1 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0700; 11:43AM; 4912 N Libbit Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PFyshJ; #Encino; It took 20 firefighters 15 minutes to extinguish fire in the attached garage and attic of a one-story single-family home. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E288 E293 E39 RA88 T88 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0700; 11:28AM; 4912 N Libbit Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PFyshJ; #Encino; Smoke showing from the garage (attached) of a one-story single-family home. Offensive mode.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E288 E293 E39 RA88 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1151; 04:33PM; 1500 S Gaffey St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Vdx3A5; #SanPedro; Firefighters responded to an (apparent) solo-vehicle crash with two elderly patients trapped. Firefighters quickly extricated both patients (one male, one female) and transported them to the hospital in moderate condition. LAPD Inc #2525. Nothing further.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E248 RA101 RA112 T48; CH4; Nicholas Prange

Traffic Collision; INC#1174; 04:49PM; 18900 W Saticoy St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PEq02c; #Reseda; Firefighters responded to an (apparent) solo-vehicle crash with one patient trapped. Sadly, the trapped patient was deceased at the scene. One other patient exited the vehicle on their own with minor injuries and was transported to the hospital in fair condition. Unknown age/gender. LAPD Inc #2581. Nothing further.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E273 E293 EM15 HR3 RA104 RA73 T73 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1193; 05:29PM; 2453 N Jupiter Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V6ifTZ; #HollywoodHillsWest; Thirty firefighters mounted a swift attack, coordinating interior fire attack with rooftop ventilation, and extinguished the flames in 25 minutes. Thankfully, all occupants escaped the burning home unharmed. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC18 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E260 E27 E293 E41 E61 E97 EM14 RA27 RA97 T27 T60 T93; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1193; 05:04PM; 2453 N Jupiter Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V6ifTZ; #HollywoodHillsWest; Two-story descending hillside home with fire on the second floor. Offensive mode.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E227 E260 E27 E41 E97 RA27 RA97 T27 T60; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange
